author: Aarian Marshall
title: Closed Streets, Pumping Air, and More Car News This Week
description: Cities are remaking themselves for pedestrians and bikes, while hospitals are shape-shifting to handle the tide of Covid-19 patients.
content: This week, we found ourselves fascinated by some of the more hidden effects wrought by the Covid-19 pandemic. By the complicated journey, for example, of the oxygen that is eventually pumped into life-saving ventilators, and the tricky art of storing the stuf… [+2512 chars]
